summary: Somaliland is a country in East Africa that is not officially recognized by other nations. It was once part of Somalia but declared independence in 1991 due to political conflicts. Somaliland has its own government, capital city (Hargeisa), and borders with countries like Djibouti and Ethiopia. Despite having a large territory and population, it is not a member of the United Nations. Many people from Somaliland want other countries to acknowledge their independence, and it is known as the largest unrecognized state globally based on its size.
title: Somaliland
